name: Starecha Nichols
text: My first time eating at Blaze Pizza and it was amazing!! My pizza was cooked perfectly and tasted amazing. It also looked appealing. I ordered the White Top pizza. Melissa was the employee to assist me and she was wonderful. She was quick …More

name: Josh Jenkins
text: Cherry! How could you burn my knots!!! 😂 she made it up though, and was absolutely incredible.  😊😊 excellent customer service, tessnessa was an excellent cashier. Tasty pizza, tasty knots. 10/10 recommend

name: Brian Paniagua
text: Good flavor overall.  The thin crust is was on point.  Just be a little more generous with the toppings and we Gucci.

name: Lana Dahle
text: Blaze is my favorite of the build your own pizza type restaurants. Build your own is the best and do the 1/2 pizza and 1/2 build your own salad as a combo and your set. They have good sodas and don't skip the s'mores cookie served warm. My …More

name: Gary Bowen
text: We ordered online and gave a tip up front (not sure how our society has decided tips should be up front before any service is provided). One pizza was correct. The other was missing three toppings from the printed receipt that was on the box. I know things get busy sometimes but please pay attention. The pizzas were cooked well.

name: Kaitlyn Romriell
text: Pizza was great!!! Customer service was awful. I didn’t get the name of the girl but she had pink hair. We asked for it to-go and she handed it to us on a tray, I nicely asked if we could get it to-go again and she proceeded to tell me very …More

name: Bobby Smalley
text: I got a build your own with every spicy thing they had to offer. Oh man it was so good. They were late getting my online pick up order done in time but it was a busy night and it was worth the wait. Very nice and apologetic staff that were …More

name: Joe Christensen
text: I love the option to build my own pizza. It's always super tasty. We'll go back again and again.

name: Larry Looking
text: First timer to Blaze. I was quite surprised with their Pizza. It was really good. My wife and I ordered from the car and they brought it to us within 10 minutes. We usually eat one our two pieces then take the rest home. Not this time! We ate the whole pizza in the parking lot. We will be back for sure.

name: JR O
text: Great place.. kids love making their own pizza. Have ate here a couple times with my boss as well.  They also have gluten free options.  It’s expensive so not a place I take my kids all the time.  For 3 pizzas and 3 drinks was 30 dollars. …More

name: Brody Dezember
text: Normally it is good, today it wasn't. The place was a mess, no dough ready ,garbages were full, no napkins in the holders, drinks were empty and the pizza oven hasn't been cleaned or something in awhile. The bottom of our pizzas were very …More

name: Marie Mcclain
text: Came here with my husband at the Farmington location. It was the worst customer service. Not only we were the only ones in line but l waited 10 minutes before they started my order. Very slow and the staff members all looked like they hated …More

name: Alex Wesley
text: Mel was great! They close for about 30 minutes at 3 to sanitize which is nice, I had a pick up order that wasnt ready when I got there so she ran it out for me when it was done and brought some extra dipping sauces! I will be going back for Mel!

name: Jeff Potter
text: Perfect place to get pizza how you want it.   The family loved it and everyone got the pizza they liked.  Prices are good as well.  Would have included a picture but I ate pizza before I thought about posting how tasty their foood is.

name: Wolf Thorne
text: Pretty cool place where you can build your own pizza. It has different choices of crust, even Gluten Free crust. Has a variety of sauces, cheeses and toppings of your choice.

name: Heather Taylor
text: Blaze is my favorite build it yourself pizza! The dough is super thin crust style and all the toppings are awesome. If it's really busy it can take a little bit of time to get your pizza, but it's always piping hot and fresh! Come here a lot after running errands - totally LOVE it!

name: Eva Johnson
text: Keto crust pizza was sooo good! Can't wait to go again!

name: Carey Karger
text: Delicious pizza and friendly staff! The pizza has a thin crispy crust, and I really like the "build your own" concept with unlimited toppings. We enjoyed both the pizza and the vibe of the restaurant. The brownie and chocolate chip cookies are amazing! They'll even warm them up for you! Yum!

name: Melissa B.
text: We love this place. Great prices and amazing food. Great customer service.

name: Tyson Armstrong
text: I eat in this lovely place from time to time! This is the best place to dine.  I go to this spot many times. The meals are just great, the staff is friendly and the prices are good. I like going in this spot over a nice lunch.

name: Axely Vega Plasencia
text: The pizzas are really tasty and filling.  The crust is super crunchy.

name: Jason Hammer
text: Blaze is high quality pizza for one at a good price. I would say that the build your own pizza is the best value. Their drinks are also quite good. It’s different pizza, but good. The restaurant itself is clean and has a nice atmosphere. Would definitely recommend.

name: Brandie Prado
text: Blaze is consistently good. I've gone to Blaze in other areas and it never disappoints

name: Robert Olson
text: Blaze pizza is great. Line can get a little long but it moves quick. I also recommend mixing the spicy sauce with regular. It's the perfect blend.

name: Kyle Hackmeister
text: I LOVE Blaze pizza, probably my favorite chain pizza. The ingredients are fresh and the dough is delicious! This location is a little lacking in friendly employees I will say. I’ve been helped multiple times by cold and uncaring people. …More

name: Jenny Charlotte
text: Ordered lunch through the app, very user friendly. Pizza & garlic knots were wonderful, both were fresh, fast and very tasty! Will definitely order from here again.

name: Jordan Montano
text: Pretty good pizza and price! It is a Chipotle, counter-style restaurant. They have special pizzas or you can just create your own for $7.95. …More

name: Peg Guerra
text: It's a set price and you choose your own toppings like at Subway! Wish we had one here! Extra cheese? No extra charge, 3, 4, 5 toppings? No extra charge. Quick service!

name: Phil Rogers
text:
Food was excellent.  Place was filthy filthy.
Dirty Glass, dirty floors, and considering the Pandemic where only about five tables are available to use, customer after customer had to use them.  They were gross. They had people standing around who could have been cleaning.

name: Sarah Roberts
text: We came here on a double date and it was pretty good. They don't have as many traditional pizzas that I was expecting but I enjoyed what I ordered.

name: Liz G
text: Blaze pizza is like a subway. You pick your crust and sauce and toppings then they put it in a brick oven to cook. You pay a base price and then can build your own pizza. What ever toppings you want... same price. You can also just get a …More

name: Mckay Simpson
text: Very fast service, and great food. I always get a bbq chicken pizza and the garlic knots, and a drink. Around $16 bucks for a date night doesn't suck at all!

name: Anne Bingham
text: Finally a pizza place for people with dietary restrictions! Cauliflower crust was really good--thin and crispy, which I like. They have a thicker crust option. I love that you choose your toppings and see them put them on right in front of …More

name: Allen Miller
text: Food is always good and fast.

name: Beverly Zayas Hayes
text: They seemed really rushed and the lady at the end added was say too much balsamic vinegar to my.pizza.

name: J Lee
text:
Great pizza!
I visited BLAZE again this weekend. This is the best pizza on the Earth!  "Cam" is especially helpful. He'll do anything to make sure your pizza is exactly like …More

name: Jessica Nielsen
text: Loved this place!! I haven’t been able to finish a full meal for a long time, and I finished my whole White Top Pizza + Chicken wanting more! Quick, happy service, delicious meal and chill atmosphere (:

name: Fro
text: The build your own pizza is great idea, tons of toppings to choose from.  However the suace,  which is the most critical part of the pizza was bland and tasteless.  If the company name is their goal, a blazing fast pizza,  they fell short …More

name: Hania Barton
text:
This is the best Pizza I’ve had since I left New York.  So fresh, beautiful quality and ingredients!  The staff is incredibly kind, and I highly recommend a chocolate chip cookie or two for dessert! :)
Thanks guys!

name: Manitoba Hawkins
text: Stylish. Echo-intense structure (lots of metal). Tons of options and great gluten free crusts to choose from beyond the great toppings.

name: Zachary Pinnau
text: They have a good selection of pre designed pizzas and you can also create your own. The price is a little more then I care to pay. The pizza was good but I've had better. I prefer a thicker crust but even for a thin crust pizza it was ok. I …More

name: Jamie Barker
text: Favorite pizza place. Love the cauliflower crust! Great healthier option!

name: Michael Clark
text: Thin chewy crunchy crust and fresh veggies! Vegan pizza was great, as was the pepperoni. Will be coming back.

name: Lucius Alexander
text: Custom made pizza! Thin brick oven pizza with a variety of toppings at a great value. Fast too! In or take out, but fresh out of the oven is best.

name: Rhett Wilson
text: Pizza was great and the price wasn't bad. It's a line setup like you would see at Cafe Rio. The pizza cooked fast and was delicious. …More

name: Jay Reyes
text: The staff was very friendly and helped explain to this newbie how everything there worked. I like how you can see how the crust is being created and also all ingredients looked very fresh and lots of options. The menu is very simple and …More

name: Dineshkumar Ponnusamy
text:
Taste is good. Quality is much better than dominos or Pizza Hut.

Cons: …More

name: Ron Schindler
text: Inexpensive and pretty fast. You can't blame anyone for the way your pizza turns out since you make it exactly the way you like it. I mix the Pesto garlic sauce with the soft red sauce and then add all the things I like.

name: Michael White
text: Fast and personalized pizza. Fun to go with friends and kids.

name: Steve Troop
text: Love the food here. Build your own is the best.

name: T. S.
text: Quick service, good food. They now offer a large pizza if you would rather not have the standard pizza size.

name: Logan Chugg
text: Very good all around!! We came in at a busy time and the staff was still fast and friendly! Great service in the lobby as well! Very high quality pizza at a good price and amazing portions. Recommend trying a build your own with the white …More

name: Austin Hughes
text: Not that good. $30 for two pizzas. Tasted like the $5 hot and ready pizzas but 3 x the price. Ordered one with white sauce, don't think it even had any sauce on it. Extremely dry. Crust was good, brick oven flavor.

name: crystal price
text: Very tasty.. thin crust.. I'm vegan and they made me an all veggie pizza and salad with a balsamic glaze dressing.. very tasty.. not heavy.. would recommend.

name: Emma Cavazotti

text: Build-your-own Gluten free crust with green pesto sauce, kalamata olives, artichoke,mushroom, spinach, chopped garlic and 4 different cheeses. Cooked in 5 minutes. Heaven.

name: Michael R
text: Edit: they seem to have fixed their issues with the food and the employees are nice. They now get 4 stars instead of the original 1. …More

text: We ordered online and they messed up our order. We came back to get a new one and ended up waiting half an hour just to get one pizza while people around us were getting served.

name: Steve H
text: Great pizza made from fresh ingredients at a reasonable price.

text: Awesome place! $10 to load up your own pizza with everything you want and as much as you want. Can't wait to come back. Very filling!

name: keaton wilde
text: Super tasty for a great price

name: Ron Atkinson
text: As far as I'm concerned, you can have the best pizza ever. Because you are allowed to tell them what and how much of any item that you want on it. It always tastes better than any other pizza I've ever had.

name: Day Family
text: Can't say anything about the pizza cause I never received any. I put in an online order for delivery.  After calling, sitting on hold, being hung up on, calling back, sitting on hold for around 30 minutes and finally talking to a …More

text: Wow the place is very busy. A busy place means good eats. We will be visiting again.

name: Nick Gilson
text: I’d never been the Blaze before but the kids were set on pizza so we decided to give it a try. I’m so glad that we did. …More

name: Matt Hoskins
text: This was great pizza. Perfect size for one person. I had the BBQ chicken pizza and it was great. They were fast and had a great combination of ingredients. I also like the location of the restaurant. Station park is one of my favorite places to go and eat as well as shopping.

name: Kyle Wiser
text: Horrible customer service!  I ordered a pizza online using a coupon that came from Blaze.  It said valid online.  Applied the coupon and the price adjusted to what I was expecting.  Hit check out and the order went through at the original …More

name: Bob Marabella
text: Great pizza.  The build your own pizza is fabulous.  Love the creative toppings that rotate in and out.  This is a must eat place at Farmington square

name: Mike Norton

name: Holly Rogers
text: Pizza is super fresh and tasted great. They just had a problem cutting it into slices. I would definitely go back.

name: bookkrworm
text: A bit different than some pizza places I've been to before, but still very good food. It's sort of a create your own pizza, with lots of options for dough types (including gluten free), cheeses, meats, vegetables, and spices.

name: Casey Barton
text: They have had great pizza, also the vegan cheese is good. I prefer this to MOD.

name: Sayward Oakley
text: It was not for me personally. I went here on a cold windy day I could smell the pizza from outside. It smelled good and I decided why not. The dough was lacking and the sauce was on the bland side. It was also quite loud here as they were shouting out names.

name: Bob Haslam
text: Great atmosphere. Great food. Vegan cheese and options are wonderful

name: Breck Springer

name: Brent Lane
text: AWESOME PIZZA! Great service and very reasonable prices! A friend recommended we try Blaze Pizza while in SLC...boy are we glad we did! This place is absolutely fantastic! Go try it and make your own Pizza Pie creation!

name: Daniel Layton
text: I live this place!  Price is amazing! Service is amazing!  If your thinking pizza,  don't skip this place.  Definitely worth it.

name: Maritza Mestre-Touma
text: A bit pricey for decent pizza.  The ability to create your own is nice, but that's negated by the cost.  2 pizzas and  drink cost over 24.00.  The pizzas are large enough for two people to share and come away reasonably satisfied. Due to …More

name: Marci Preece
text: We tried you pizza for the first time today.  The young lady helping us was friendly and helpful with my questions.  I am gluten free. The gluten free pizza crust was one of the best I had.  It tasted like a normal pizza crust. The place was clean.  A great value for the price. Will definitely be back.

name: Schae Foster
text: My brothers & I stopped in for pizza after a long day at Lagoon. The employees were fun to talk to & the pizza was good. I would definitely recommend it to my friends & family

name: Jacob Ber
text: Great place! They allow you to build your own pizza or choose from their selection of specialty pies. The garlic knots are divine! Took off one star as tables/floor was not as clean as they could have been.

name: Trent Molly Thompson
text: Love that they offer gluten-free vegan options.

name: N B L
text: Food was good, much like MOD pizza choices. However Blaze seem to offer more veggie options. The staff was pleasant and helpful.

name: Sandra Stanger
text: Truthfully, I thought the pizza crust would taste like cardboard.  It didn't!  Who would have guessed...delicious fast food pizza.

name: Danielle McConnell
text: The choices are so unlimited here! ❤ I don't think I'd ever get tired of this place! yumm

name: Lee MacPeek
text: Tried the me to crust. It was very tasty and a nice change from other places.

name: Jada Bennett
text: A little overpriced for the average person. If you like a lot of toppings this is pretty good. (You don't have to pay extra for more toppings.)

name: Richard Watts
text: Love the make your own thin crust. It's great if your a diabetic and have to watch your carb count.

name: Jim Brewster

name: Kylie Grant
text: 5 stars to the guy with red curly hair. While the others sat in the back and talked he checked a crowded line out, took care of cooking the pizzas, cut up the pizzas and boxed them. When he put bbq sauce on my pizza I asked for oregano, he …More

name: Cheryll Christensen
text: While tables are social distance, too many not wearing a mask.

name: Sam Kem
text: The location is convenient. The staff was friendly and the food was great. The wait can be long during peak times of the day.

name: 真善美C
text: Fresh...i built my own.

name: Josh Leavitt
text: This place is far too busy on pretty much every day of the week. Friday I waited over an hour, which kind of negates the whole fast fired pizza thing. They seem to lose online orders when it gets busy. The pizza can be good, but it's not worth the wait.

name: Teran Davies
text: Took away their amazing GF crust.. stopped in EVERY time I was in Farmington in the past to eat here. Now sadly I won't go back, and no I don't want the gross cauliflower crust.

name: Steve Barnson
text: Friendly staff, tasty food, and an upbeat atmosphere. I've been in many times before and we've noticed wait times are getting shorter. …More

name: Lori Stagg
text: The flavor was really good. I liked all the different options they had. However, I am not a big fan of the flat crust. I like the thicker crust pizza.

name: Blake Montgomery
text: Pizza is good but the employees need help. No urgency or sense of customer service. Did an online order, arrived when pizza was supposed to be ready, and they hadn't even started my order. Place was empty, they weren't busy at all. Had to …More

name: Treion Muller
text: Love the pizza here! You can make your own so you’ll not be disappointed

name: Keyan Hansen
text: Great affordable pizza. Pretty quick, cooked in a brick oven. You can make your own, customize it, or customize one of their options. I loved my pizza, but it's not a high-end place. They're a little better than pizza studio, or California Pizza kitchen. Definitely better than little Caesars and other chain pizza stores.

name: Cole Roueche
text: Best pizza around. It's really big in California.

name: Bretanne Powers
text: First time coming to any Blaze Pizza and I was floored. Food is great, but most impressed with the amazing service, especially SJ, he had some of the greatest customer service I've experienced anywhere. Will definitely be coming back!

name: Gene Hayes
text: I love this place. Great tasting Pizza. Good customer service. Convenient location.

name: Luis Figueroa
text: Got kicked out of the restaurant because I showed up 10 minutes before they opened. The staff was very unfriendly about it as well. Would recommend blue lemon next door instead! After reading some reviews, no surprise that no one likes the staff.

name: Jared Lattin
text: Really good pizza, but really slow to get through the line. Not a good place to go if you're in a hurry and there's anyone in line.

name: Shawn Green

name: mark wayne
text: Even though it was very busy i still got great and also quick service

name: T S

text: I love coming here and making my own beautiful pizza creation.  They have a million different toppings to choose from and take the time to make each pizza customized to you.  They do not rush you at all and are very friendly.  I have yet to …More

name: Melissa Lusk
text: The build your own pizza has unlimited toppings for the same price as the prebuilt ones.

name: Kaylin Davis
text: Loved the staff there. My favourite is the build your own pizza. They have many toppings you can choose from. Absolutely loved the flavour of the pizza. Would recommend going to if you're nearby.

name: MMS
text: Everytime we come here everybody is extremely friendly and genuine. Brittney was really patient with me while I was indecisive about my pizza decision and also extremely friendly. It is employees like her that make me want to come back. The pizza is delicious and made just the way I like it!

name: Romey Beseiso
text: Yummy Pizza, great service and positive vibes! a triple win!

name: Brandon Avery
text: This place is awesome! I love being able to create my own pizza just how I want it. Tons of options on toppings too. The crust is always perfectly thin yet crispy and delicious.

name: Jacob Bagley
text: I was very skeptical when going here. They proved me wrong. It was unique and fantastic! I've only been the one time, but I definitely want to go again to see if the second time is as good as the first.

name: Dan Bean

text: Good. Hot n fast.

name: Megan Smith
text: The pizza is very yummy! I love the crunchy thin crust. text: Awesome pizza place because I can get an all vegan pizza that tastes great.

name: Dustin Williams
text: Good pizza. You can customize it with your favorite toppings and at a very reasonable price. The customer service also was very good.

name: Jim Ellis
text: Service is soooooo slow. The long line that seems to indicate the restaurant being so popular is actually just the same 10 people who have never gotten through the line.

name: Sean Quinton
text: Great service and the pizza was awesome!

name: Sydney Harris
text: My fiance and I came on a very busy night we waited in line for 15 ish minutes. The place was packed but the employees were working as best as they could to please everyone and make sure orders were being taken accurately. Love blaze pizza!! Employees are amazing!

name: Rachel Namba-Coplin
text: Pizza is yummy but service is REALLY slow. There were no plates or knives and pizza was difficult to eat because it wasn't cut all the way through. Staff was not helpful at all. It took a lot of time to get a box to take home left overs and every table was dirty. Most of this could be solved with better management and more staff.

name: Suzy Johnson
text: I enjoy the pizza but the lady who helped take our order is not customer service oriented at all...she is rude and ignored us for about 5 minutes

name: Kurtis Merrill
text: The staff was very helpful and attentive. Tried their suggested BBQ chicken as on the menu but we added sausage to half to try it. It's great that there no limits on the different kinds of toppings to put on. Was a little disappointed on …More

name: Hunter Wilson
text: The Staff has been amazing the the 30+ times we have gone. My girlfriend has celiac and they handle the gluten free pizza carefully so there is minimal cross contamination. We will be going back many times in the future! I want to say that …More

name: Aaron Havens
text: They make good fire baked pizzas. It is straight forward. I like others more but this one is closest to my home.

name: Jonathan Magness
text: Great pizza and great customer service.

name: Nic Ellis
text: Love .. Love this place.  My favorite pizza joint by far. If you have not had it ... you must . My fiance and I both love this..  the best ingredients the best crust ... the best pizza ..  and the desserts are mind blowing.

name: Glenn Borders
text: It is great to pick your toppings and having the pizza made in front of you.

name: Josh
text: Super delicious but sometimes it gets packed and it takes a while to get through the line because it’s all cooked fresh.

name: A Google User
text: I have better pizza in a real wood fired oven. Staff was real nice

name: Dirk Mitchell
text: This is a great place to eat, good value for what you get for sure. They have a huge selection of toppings and you can make your pizza however you want. This is really nice for groups as well since everyone can customize their own. The …More

name: Aleisha Beard
text: Vegetarian and vegan friendly!! Rare quality for a pizza place to have. Our family loves to go here. Price is comparable to any restraunt around.

name: Janet Avery
text: Blaze is the BEST pizza anywhere around. Their staff is friendly and welcoming every time---even on Pi day.

name: K. Anne McCoy
text: I love Blaze but I had to leave after waiting a half hour in line and only moving a couple of feet. It was ridiculous. Ended up going to Mod Pizza instead which was better, faster, and cheaper.

name: Kyle Anderson
text: Delicious, but whoa, what a wait! Arrived at 6:00pm, ordered at 6:45, pizza came out of the oven at 7:00. I would actually really recommend this place, if you have the time, but I can’t give a 5-star review until they can figure out a better workflow.

name: Mick Zeller
text: I'd go back. Good food at a decent price. The atmosphere is slightly noisy but comfortable.

name: Michael Roberts
text: Super awesome staff! We love to come here, my daughter has a dairy allergy. The staff goes out of there way to build a safe pizza just for her. They are great at communicating her allergy along the production line. They even change out …More

name: LeAnne Doxey
text: Great pizza and experience! They are very light on the toppings, but I will just ask for more next time. Great prices too!  I have a gluten allergy, and their crust was so yummy and crispy! They also change their gloves, and use a new sauce …More

name: Derek Dickerson
text: Seriously one of my favorite places to go for pizza. Thin crust, brick oven cooked, sized for 2 small eaters or one big and topped with almost anything you could ever want.. great stop. Oh and try the mango soda they have! Off the charts!

name: Jason Mathis
text:
I love Blaze, I'll be honest. But I also love pizza. It's hard for me to properly describe how much I love pizza, so I won't waste your time.
1. Price/portions - pretty fair for a decent personal sized pizza. My wife and I …More

name: Matthew Coltrin
text: Very low quality employees. I had an issue with the dough for my pizza and they took about 20 minutes fixing it with an empty store. All the tables were dirty and there was trash on the floors, but the employees really didn't care. They …More

name: Tami Griffith
text: Buy a crust and put on any topping you like. Love the artichoke and roasted garlic so much!

name: Ashtyn Aure
text: I love Blaze. They have great quality & great options, especially for those that are health conscious. I've been to 3+ locations on multiple occasions. This was by far the slowest service I've ever received. It took about twenty minutes to …More

name: Lisa Barclay
text: Awesome staff! Very fast, clean, and friendly environment, also loving the new broccoli! Glad to see this store improving over the past couple months, wait times used to be long.

name: Matthew Singer
text: Pizza is very good, very quick, I'd rate higher but no beer. I mean, pizza and beer are friends and should be together.

name: Měķø 2309
text: The pizza was great you could basically put anything on it and they make it right in front of you!

name: brian namba
text: Pizza was good.  Better than Caesars or dominoes.  Not as good as a good local pizzaria.

name: Heidi Treharne
text: Thank you for offering the best possible and authentic Italian gluten-free crust. Absolutely amazing. Love the service given with a smile. My favorite place to eat!

name: derek pedersen
text: I had a vegan spicy sausage (made from soy) pizza and It was great. I would have it again!

name: Charles Sim
text: They make really great pizza. The fire gives it a great flavor. Highly recommend.

name: Zachary Ferrell
text: Keto crust tastes as good as traditional crust

name: Blake Montgomery
text: Pizza is great. Only problem is they seem understaffed everytime I've been there. Line moves very slow and tables never get cleaned off. Seems like hiring just one or two more employees would help things run more smoothly. If things were quicker I'd bump my review up to 5 stars.

name: Jen Williams
text: Delicious!!! Staff is friendly and fast!

name: Emily Rich
text: Amazing! The thin crusts were delicious. They have lots of options, allowing for customization. It all comes at a fair price as well.

name: Peter Demars
text: Love the mango water here, got a free one from a coupon on the app

name: Seth Brown
text:
Fast, inexpensive and tasty.

2nd visit: 8 employees making pizza. Waited close to an hour for this "blazing fast" pizza. Probably won't be back.

name: Kade Lundberg
text: Build your own is well worth it. It’s a large portion so normally it feeds me for 2 meals

name: Sherrae Jensen
text: But the pizza is great! The staff is friendly :) the price is fantastic.

name: Amy Brown
text: Update-Thought we'd give this place another try. Again the line was out the door and people said they had been waiting for over 40 mins! Their problem must be the staff. Just watching them you can tell the struggle. Lack of communication …More

name: Nils Jarne
text: Very good pizza! Super Yummy

name: Jake Tobin
text: Excellent pizza with good service. Tons of toppings available at no extra charge. You can start with a few configurations and build your pizza however you want it and it is cooked hot and fresh while you wait. A good amount of seating but it can get busy with a long line and full tables at times.

name: John Spires
text: We love Blaze! We've been to this location several times, the line is a little long, but it's always worth the wait. We always see how hard the staff is working to make pizzas. We were behind a lady that was nothing but rude to the staff. …More

name: Water Boy
text: What a great idea. Pizza toppings are fresh and you can put what ever you want on your pizza. This was the first time I had been here and staff was very helpful. I am a pizza snob and it has to be a certain way. I was very happy with my experience and definately will be back.

name: Leah Warren
text: This is the best pizza I've ever had

name: Tyson Sprenger
text: Absolutely horrible staff, incredibly rude with zero personality from the manager down.

name: Scott W
text: Very slow and dirty, staff have a line out the door and they have no sense of urgency. The line is cross contaminated with red meats in with the chicken and it is the same with about all of the toppings. Looks like the have not even tidied up at all tonight. My pizza was also not cooked all the way.

name: Colin Terry
text: Best pizza in town. Blaze had quickly become our family favorite. Reasonable prices with the option to put as much on the pizza as you want. Between this and their interesting toppings it's a must try.

name: Bird Mom
text: Food is amazing, service is not. Do NOT go when they have a long line or else it will be over 45 minutes. The staff seems the opposite of upbeat, and unmotivated. Almost like they don't want the customers to enjoy the experience. They put …More

name: Shane Thorpe
text: Got the at 9:45pm and they locked the doors early.  I guess they wanted to go home.  So don't trust the hours of operation!  Good food when they are open.

name: Zack Sunderland
text: Good pizza with lots of options. There's generally a line but it moves quickly. Not to expensive in my opinion $8 for a 12" thin crust build your own.

name: James
text: Great food. Amazing price. Friendly staff and good management. Always busy. Long line but worth the wait.

name: Mary Catherine Chartrand
text: Amazing pizza joint. The line was fairly long but it moved quickly. A great variety of toppings and the employees were super nice.

name: Mike Loveless
text: Delicious, fast, and friendly! This is the best pizza around. Service is great! Great variety of toppings, and the pizza isn't all dough with a bite or 2 of topping! My new favorite pizza joint!

name: Jayd Peterson
text: Vegan friendly dough and toppings if you do the build your own! Also affordable

name: hyson torne
text: Good food with great gluten free and vegan options. This is rare for a pizza place. The line moves very slow and the online ordering does not work very well. My family still loves this place. We go regularly.

name: Alyssa Fullmer
text: The pizza is delicious! Their topping options are great and the crispy crust is perfect

name: Sean Porter
text: Not a fan of the crust, but there are a lot of topping options and it's pretty good.

name: Lee Copeland
text: Great crust. Great toppings (all you ask for). Great price ($8 max). Recommend highly.

name: Kristen Franklin
text: Had the green slice this time. Delicious

name: Neil Essig
text: The pizza here is pretty good. The dough is not the greatest pozza dough around but that's not what this place is about. It is about a fully customizable pizza with dozens of toppings to choose from and no price increases for additional toppings. Plus, they have fresh mozzarella as a topping. Amazing!

name: Jeff Bushaw
text: Loved our pizza and our experience here! We went on a busy Saturday night with a line of at least 30 people. The line was much faster than I expected. The employees were very pleasant to order from and very organized. And the pizza was …More

name: Major Burningham
text: One price no matter what you add to your pizza. Great toppings. The high rise crust is 2 extra dollars but is more filling if that's what you are in to. Almost always busy but always worth it.

name: J.D. Barlow
text: Best pizza place I've been in a long time. Great value for what you pay and it is delicious. We go often.

name: Rafael Mendez
text: Very good fast food pizza.  You get to choose your crust, your sauce and your toppings.  They have several meat, cheese and vegetable toppings, all made to order, as you walk the line.  Choose as many as you want and as much as you want

name: Anthony S
text: Love the concept. Pizza dough is just ok but still good pizza.

name: Joanna Daines
text: Pizza tasted good. One of them was good thpugh singy on cheese, the other was sent back because the dough was in 2 layers and fell apart. It was just about empty looked like 4 on staff, lobby was pretty dirty crumbs left on tables napkins …More

name: Christie Wente
text: Delicious pizza. Not very fluffy crust but fast food. Provides gluten-free pizza crust.

name: Noah Leavitt
text: The pizza was good and the best part of the experience. The staff was lethargic and unfriendly as I went through the line (which moved at the pace of a snail because of the staff). I'd eat Blaze again, but probably not at this location.

name: Richard Cooper
text: Consistantly great

name: John Petersen
text: Went here last night, pizza tasted great! Of all the locations I go to, this one is the best, they never burn my pizza! And that balsamic is to die for!

name: Dave Massey
text: This was my first time eating at Blaze Pizza. I've wanted to try them for a long time. Absolutely awesome pizza and amazing friendly service. Everyone working tonight was smiling and very pleasant. I do want to specifically recognize Dallin …More

name: Heidi May
text: Bland and over cooked pizza.  Definately should go when not busy.

name: LeeAnne Edmonds
text: Nice to have the gluten free option that's not on a frozen crust! I asked for a glove change (I am very sensitive to gluten) and have not had any issues with the pizza I ordered! Delicious! I will be back!

name: Scott Andersen
text: Great selection of toppings and options! Staff was very helpful.

name: Katy Eddington
text: We ordered 4 pizza, all extremely low on cheese especially the art lover. The sauce was just thrown on in clumps. Garlic was over powering in different bites. NOT a family favorite. …More

name: Heather Hansen
text: These guys don't even have a warming oven for online orders... LAME!

name: Shauna H
text: Went tonight for the first time. Best pizza I’ve had in a long time. The staff was friendly and the price was great. We will be back!

name: Joshua Knight
text: Delicious pizza with all toppings you want.  Try the high rise crust!  The only bummer is that they don't serve beer like other Blaze Pizza franchises.  Pizza without beer... no way can that get 5 stars.

name: Jackie Schmidt
text: My husband and I eat low carb.  They made  yummy pizzas with a lettuce/arugula/spinach and cheese crust.  It was damn good!  Thanks James (night mgr)

name: Marcee Allred
text: I enjoy being able to customize my pizzas

name: Lindsay Rasmussen
text: Food: delicious. Wait time: ridiculous. Waited one hour in line (not exaggerating). Definitely not worth that long of a wait. When their claim is fast fired pizza it shouldnt be an hour wait. Will not be going here again.

name: Ellie Hansen
text: DEEEEELISH! Seriously so good. Staff was friendly and helpful. Reasonably priced and fun atmosphere. The pizza was delectable. Highly recommend!!!

text: The service at this location was not good at all. I got stuck behind a group of people that were friends with the staff. I waited for 15 minutes before I was helped, while their pizzas got loaded up with tons of free toppings. When I …More

text: Rip off. Not worth the super expensive price. Just go to little Caesars

text: My gluten free pizza was fantastic!! I recommend having them put garlic pesto sauce under neath the red sauce 👌

name: Keith Brady

name: AJ Webb
text: I've had a couple of pizza from Blaze now and both have been great! Ordered to go and they prepare them, but they wait to cook them till you get there to pick them up. No matter what you leave with a fresh pizza. Fantastic!

text: I LOVE their pizza.! Totally worth any wait you may have. I have been going since they open up.

name: denice shunn

text: Food is great and staff is friendly. But there's no sense of urgency, it's still newly opened so it could improve but as it is, even if there's no one there it takes 5 minutes to top the pizza. Should take like one.

text:
Best place around to get vegan pizza, and staff is super friendly.

text: Great personal size pizzas!
